message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your price point, but $20,000 is really the lowest I can go right now. This product is incredibly valuable and in high demand. I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment. What do you say?
